summary: Access data on Google Drive including operations like copying, deleting, downloading, listing, sharing, updating, and uploading files or creating, deleting, and sharing folders.

parameters.name: authentication
parameters.description: Choose the authentication method (Service Account or OAuth2) to access Google Drive.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to work with (Drive, File, or Folder).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Choose the operation to perform on the selected resource (e.g., Copy, Delete, Download, List, Share, Update, Upload for files or Create, Delete, Share for folders).

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Specify the file by either selecting from a list or providing a Google Drive file URL.
